title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi-4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; install via pip install ollama.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; npm install ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings, tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama; docker-compose one-liner.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; available on Maven Central.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with readline & history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal Retrieval-Augmented Generation template using Ollama, Chroma & LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-nvidia-trt
summary: Experimental integration enabling TensorRT-LLM backend for NVIDIA GPUs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module to run Ollama inside CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-cpp-py
summary: Unofficial Python bindings exposing Ollama’s cpp libraries for fast local inference.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot using Socket-mode to converse with Ollama models privately.
